description:
Increase your options for locking your bike. With nearly 3 feet of cable, you can span large and oddly-shaped objects.

  • Vinyl coated cable and rubber coated cylinder protect your bike’s finish and increase the lock’s weather resistance
  • Double bolt locking mechanism is highly resistant to pulling
  • Quick-release multi-position mounting bracket
  • Includes 5 laser-cut keys, 1 with a microlight for easy use after dark
  • To secure an expensive bike, or any bike in a public, high-risk area, we recommend a strong U-lock or a combination U-lock and cable lock
name: Magnum 3043 Key Cable Lock
